name: wine-service-website
description: An online service customers to order wine packages to be delivered on a subscription basis.
author: The Brew Crew

scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --watch false --mode production --config webpack.config.js
scripts.deploy: yarn build:prod && find ../docs -type f -exec git update-index --no-assume-unchanged '{}' \; && git add --force ../docs && git commit -m "Deploy current webpage build to GitHub Pages" && find ../docs -type f -exec git update-index --assume-unchanged '{}' \;
